Ms Held Key Feature From Developers

02 Aug 1999

Microsoft is taking a lot of heat from developers of IE5 including NeoPlanet and NetCaptor for letting them beta test the auto-complete feature in IE5, then only releasing it in the version that comes with Windows leaving the version they could distribute feature-poor from a consumer standpoint.

Bait and switch? Read the full story at News.com.
